page.title: 03The Goonhavern Show
page.content: The Goonhavern Show will take place on Saturday July 13th 1985.It is a domestic and horticultural show including the Cornwall Sweet Pea Championships.It will be held in the Village Hall.People from all over Cornwall are expected to exhibit.In some respects it will be the highlight of the Goonhavern social year.Two hundred and eighty classes will be included covering such aspects as flowers and vegetables, cookery, handicraft, floral art and needle work.For the children a junior section will encourage them to display their ability in hand writing,art and craft of every type and individual topic work.A very popular section will be the floral designs on tea plates section which has produced some marvellous exhibits in the past.
